extendedInfo.description: Get the Jelly Bean 4.2 search widget on any device, now in your favorite color! This app contains a search widget pack that clones the official search bar found in Android 4.2 Jelly Bean. JB Search includes all sorts of colors to fit anyoneâs taste, and the best part is theyâre all free for you to enjoy and show off to your friends! Features:â Universal search widget packâ Official 4.2 search bar cloneâ Leads to system Google/voice searchâ 9 vibrant semi-transparent colorsâ Button-press/hover animationâ 4x1 Fit to screenâ Re-sizable â Landscape/portrait modeâ Compatible with all launchersâ Supports all anroid versions and screen resolutionsâ Small APK sizeâ 0% battery drainColors:â Stock (white)â Blackâ Blueâ Greenâ ICS-Blueâ Orangeâ Pinkâ Purpleâ RedMore Info:To apply a JB search widget, long-press on your home screen and select the widgets button in the pop-up, then scroll down to J and select the color of your choice (if you are on 3.0/4.0+ the widget menu can be found in your app drawer)Pressing the widgets will launch your default search app to search the web as well as your contacts, messages, apps, and more. We have no control over the searches and can not see them. They are controlled from the stock Google search app. For more information regarding the widgets or search, please view Google's privacy policy online at http://www.google.com/policies/privacy/ These search widgets will work on all stock and 3rd party launchers including ADW, Launcher Pro, Trebuchet, Jelly Bean Launcher, ICS Launcher, HC Launcher, Nova, Apex, GO, Holo, etc.Avast reporting as malware?! No it's not malware, it is the AdNetwork's SDK which has been certified by Verisign and fully approved by Google. Avast and a few other outdated scanners will mark this as a potential risk because of the required permissions. Don't be fooled, use a scanner with legitimate identifiers like Lookout Security or AVG. Read the privacy policy located on our website or send us an email for more info.Then why are there so many permissions? Well, most are required for the stock search controls. The others are necessary for our AdNetwork's SDK and are explained in more detail here - http://www.startapp.com/permissions/. All permissions added are completely harmless and at no point do we collect or store any personal information! Our user's privacy is a top priority, but please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.â¨This app provides a few useful shortcuts on your device in the form of a search bookmark link and home screen icon. This gives us a few cents each time the app is downloaded for the first time and will help us out a lot in developing more apps. If you do not want to use these new tools, you can simply ignore or delete them by dragging the icon to the trashcan and no harm is done (our app remains the same, no need to uninstall it). Thank you!If you have any questions or comments, please visit our website or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!Google, Android, and Jelly Bean 4.1 are trademarks of Google, Inc.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I rarely rate apps but I\'m a heavy themer and these search bars fit any themes. Very cool keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Emmanuel Gomez

reviews.title: good looking but needs improv
reviews.comment: the widget is placed too high on the grid either give us option to to have it centered or please lower it so it\'s more realistic on older 4x4 launchers. also the voice search still does not work on android 2.3. 5 stars if these features are fixed
reviews.author: Hengsheng Huang

reviews.title: Colored Jelly Bean Bar Review
reviews.comment: Would be awesome if you guys lowered the position on the home screen grid. It\'s too high. Other then that it\'s great.

reviews.title: Work perfect now.
reviews.comment: Its good, simple and well designed. 5 stars!

reviews.comment: The search bar seems a little thinner than the original Jelly Bean search bar, and the voice search shortcut doesn\'t work.

reviews.title: Team Air Push
reviews.comment: Antiviral mobile alert. You can never rid the simple herpies malware that Team Syndicate sneakily distributes and will disrupt devices yearning to be up to date \"look wise\"  with the latest Android version. Just so you know, underneath the beautiful colors, exclusive  to Team Syndicate\'s search bar. Proceed with caution, this developer takes information acquired and provides it for :JvV NYC
reviews.author: James von Veit

reviews.title: App still has no voice
reviews.comment: Great colors great function. But the app has no voice. The update for voice doesn\'t work. BUT...I like this team of Developers so I\'ll keep it because it does it\'s main function...search.
